name: Mercury
interesting_fact: The closest planet to the Sun and the smallest in the Solar System.

name: Venus
interesting_fact: It is much drier than Earth, and its atmosphere is ninety times as dense.

name: Earth
interesting_fact: The only place where life is known to exist.

name: Mars
interesting_fact: Probably our second home. There used to be liquid water here.

name: Jupiter
interesting_fact: It is the largest planet in the solar system. Jupiter is the third brightest object in the Solar System, after Venus and the Moon

name: Saturn
interesting_fact: Its beautiful rings are not solid. They are made up of bits of ice, dust and rock

name: Uranus
interesting_fact: It is the coldest planet in the Solar System

name: Neptune
interesting_fact: Neptune has the Strongest Winds in the Solar System
